name: The Man in the Suit
description:
THE MAN IN THE SUIT

The Man in the Suit is about a person who is living their best life and finding themselves hunted/haunted by a man in a suit for a deal they signed 16 years ago. 

You will travel through 7 different locations and have conversations with 15 unique characters.

HOW TO PLAY

To move: the arrow keys

To interact: Space / Enter (or any key)
